long_description: Made from natural materials and decorated with original printed artwork, the Sherpani Willow Shoulder Bag offers a stylish look and useful features for your everyday urban adventures. Original print by artist Cathy Nichols has a durable polyurethane coating to preserve its beauty. Made from natural-fiber, heavy cotton canvas with faux-leather trim and light-colored honeycomb-print lining. Deep main zip compartment has zip storage pocket and organizational slot pockets; fob clip helps you easily locate your keys. Includes 3 exterior pockets for stashing other necessities; 1 snap-flap, 1 zip and 1 drop-in. Sherpani Willow Shoulder Bag has an adjustable, heavy-duty cotton webbing shoulder strap.
short_description: Made from natural materials and decorated with original printed artwork, the Sherpani Willow Shoulder Bag offers a stylish look and useful features for your everyday urban adventures.
